name: BARK - The Fearless Leader

attributes.value: Flat Cap, Pinstriped Vest, Bow Tie

description: BARK is the fearless leader of the Underdogs, embodying a unique blend of courage and charm. Combining the sturdy build of a French Bulldog with the fiery energy of a Tasmanian Devil, BARK sports a sharp pinstriped vest, flat cap, and a bow tie. This distinctive appearance symbolizes BARK's role as a leader and innovator in the Underdogs community.
